PAGE_SLIDES.title: Welcome to
PAGE_SLIDES.text: is a practical, modern and simple manager propierty for landlords and tenants. Your main functions is manage your properties, manage maintenance of your units and rental receipt management.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Manager your properties
PAGE_SLIDES.text: lts you know everything in real time, everything that is happening on your property, a dashboard for you to manage your property.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Manage Maintenance
PAGE_SLIDES.text: manages the maintenance of your units, the tenant can open an order, take photos and send to the application and and monitor the maintenance.

PAGE_SLIDES.title: Rental Receipt Management
PAGE_SLIDES.text: the tenant can pay the rent online and directly on the mobile, by transferring money directly to the owner's account via PayPal, there is no more delay.
